'''Radiant Spincrystal 48''' is an item used in the [[Furnishings]] [[Euphonium Unbound: Winding]] or [[Euphonium Unbound: Soaring]] to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] [[Streets of Elegance]] in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located on top of some boxes in front of the [[Statue of the Omnipresent God]].
